text: Trevor Modeste (born 13 January 1960) is a former Grenadian javelin thrower. ==Competition record== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |1983 |World Championships |Helsinki, Finland |bgcolor= | 18th |Javelin throw |51.84 m |- ||1991 |World Championships |Tokyo, Japan |bgcolor= | 40th |Javelin throw |62.68m |- ||1999 |Central American and Caribbean Championships |Bridgetown, Barbados | style="background:gold;"| 1st |Javelin throw |63.92m |- ||2003 |Central American and Caribbean Championships |St. George's, Grenada |bgcolor= | 5th |Javelin throw |63.64m |} ==See also== * List of javelin throwers ==References== ==External links== * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Grenadian male javelin throwers Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1987 Pan American Games Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1991 Pan American Games Category:Pan American Games competitors for Grenada Category:World Athletics Championships athletes for Grenada
title: Trevor Modeste
